intro: Curculigo glabra, commonly known as the naked arrowroot, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Orchidaceae, which includes many diverse and economically important plants. The plant is characterized by its tuberous roots, which are often used in traditional medicine.
